Our experience in Yorkshire shows that such a partnership enabled SMEs to better understand and act on flood risk, opening the way for insurers to provide affordable protection.

In other parts of the world this summer we’ve seen further violent weather, with catastrophic flooding in Germany that killed some 200 people, deadly Hurricane Ida in America and devastating wildfires in Siberia, Canada, Greece and the United States.

Temperatures are rising. The 21st century has so far been warmer overall than any of the previous three centuries. The UK’s top 10 warmest years since records began have all occurred since 2002. 

Rising temperatures are causing rising sea levels and the more violent weather.
